statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.8}+{7.83}\right)}={25.26}\approx{25.26}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{7.83}\cdot{4.59}={35.9397}\approx{35.9}.
